mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inbound ( warehouse_id, staff_id, member_id, inbound_status, inbound_reject_reason, inbound_requested_at, inbound_updated_at, inbound_at ) VALUES ( #{warehouseId}, #{staffId}, #{memberId}, #{inboundStatus}, #{inboundRejectReason}, #{inboundRequestedAt}, #{inboundUpdatedAt}, #{inboundAt})
INSERT INTO inbound_item (inbound_id, product_id, amount) VALUES (#{inboundId}, #{productId}, #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT i.inbound_id, i.warehouse_id, w.warehouse_name, i.member_id, m.member_name, i.inbound_status, ii.inbound_item_id, ii.product_id, p.product_name, ii.amount FROM inbound i JOIN warehouse w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id JOIN member m ON i.member_id = m.member_id INNER JOIN inbound_item ii ON i.inbound_id = ii.inbound_id INNER JOIN product p ON ii.product_id = p.product_id WHERE i.inbound_id = #{inboundId}
